shinycoreci 0.0.0.9005
  • Reference

Test deployed apps

test_in_deployed.Rd

Automatically runs the next app in a fresh callr::r_bg session. To stop, close the shiny application window.

test_in_connect(
  dir = "apps",
  urls = connect_urls_cache(dir = dir, apps = apps, account = "barret", server =
    "beta.rstudioconnect.com"),
  server = attr(urls, "server"),
  account = attr(urls, "account"),
  apps = apps_manual(dir),
  app = apps[1],
  port = 8080,
  host = "127.0.0.1"
)

connect_urls_cache_save(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_deploy(dir),
  server = "beta.rstudioconnect.com",
  account = "barret",
  save_file = connect_urls_cache_file(dir = dir, account = account, server = server),
  urls = connect_urls(dir = dir, apps = apps, account = account, server = server)
)

connect_urls_cache_file(dir, account, server)

connect_urls_cache(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_deploy(dir),
  account = "barret",
  server = "beta.rstudioconnect.com"
)

test_in_shinyappsio(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_manual(dir),
  app = apps[1],
  port = 8080,
  host = "127.0.0.1",
  account = "testing-apps",
  server = "shinyapps.io"
)

Arguments

dir

base folder to look for applications
urls

urls to be supplied by connect_urls output
server, account

Parameters that could be supplied to [rsconnect::deployApp]
apps

applications within dir to run
app

app number or name to start with. If numeric, it will match the leading number in the testing application
port

The TCP port that the application should listen on. If the port is not specified, and the shiny.port option is set (with options(shiny.port = XX)), then that port will be used. Otherwise, use a random port.
host

The IPv4 address that the application should listen on. Defaults to the shiny.host option, if set, or "127.0.0.1" if not. See Details.
save_file

location to save the file

Functions

  • test_in_connect: Test connect applications given the server and account

  • connect_urls_cache_save: Save connect urls as they can not be retrieved by everyone at run time

  • connect_urls_cache_file: Get cached connect url information or retrieve them from server

  • connect_urls_cache: Get cached connect url information or retrieve them from server

  • test_in_shinyappsio: Test connect applications given the server and account

Examples

if (FALSE) test_in_connect(dir = "apps")
if (FALSE) test_in_test_in_shinyapps_io(dir = "apps")
